{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-25T05:13:45.000Z", "description": "Job Description

DevOps style SREs with the skills listed below

Distributed systems knowledge like Hadoop/HBase, Kafka etc
  • Average coder in Java.
  • Python + Shell scripting knowledge is a plus.
  • Production maintenance experience.
  • Basic Kubernetes knowledge.
  • Telemetry domain knowledge is huge plus.
  • Hubble expertise
Responsibilities
  • Production maintenance and on-call.
  • Debug and fix Java code.
  • Help customer support team in answering few complicated user questions.
  • Improve automation and tooling.
